title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the GreenEnergyPredictor system. Gather input from stakeholders, identify data sources, and determine the required features and functionalities. This task includes creating a detailed project plan, conducting market research, evaluating potential technologies, and consider integrating Agile methodologies for continuous improvement. Review the current task's dependencies and ensure they are correctly identified.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data pipeline, machine learning models, and integration with grid management systems. Define the components, interfaces, and data flows.

title: Data Acquisition and Preprocessing
description: Identify and acquire relevant weather data and renewable energy production data sources. Develop data preprocessing pipelines to clean, transform, and prepare the data for model training.

title: Machine Learning Model Development
description: Develop and train machine learning models for forecasting renewable energy production based on weather data and historical production data. Evaluate and optimize model performance.

title: Grid Integration and Optimization
description: Integrate the machine learning models with grid management systems to provide forecasts and optimize energy distribution and storage based on predicted renewable energy production.

title: User Interface Development
description: Design and develop a user-friendly interface for monitoring renewable energy forecasts, grid optimization recommendations, and system performance metrics.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute testing for the GreenEnergyPredictor system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests. Ensure system reliability, accuracy, and performance.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Assess and address security risks and compliance requirements related to data privacy, system access, and grid integration. Implement necessary security measures and obtain required certifications or approvals.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and deployment pipelines for the GreenEnergyPredictor system. Automate the build, testing, and deployment processes, and implement monitoring and logging mechanisms.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the GreenEnergyPredictor system, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for stakeholders and end-users.
